item.description:
The city’s only free festival of architecture, design, and neighborhoods.
Engage with new places and interact with people who shape the city. Take a fresh look at Boston, understand its history, imagine its future, and discover it through this year’s theme of The Vital Street. Explore off-the-beaten path experiences that surprise, inspire, educate, and instill a sense of pride in Bostonians about their wonderful neighborhoods.
item.name: Common Boston!
